name: grocery-planner
description: Chrome extension for comparing grocery prices across multiple stores

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:css && npm run watch
scripts.prepare-extension: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-assets && npm run build:css && npm run cleanup-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r scraping/itemExamples dist/scraping/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: Seamus
